attributes.action: Compulsory national service for public offenders
attributes.additional_details: I wish to start this petition as a means to get the people's voice heard. Time after time we hear of public offenders being let off with ridiculous sentences - hardly a deterrent for other criminals. The lack of respect in society is there for all to see after the recent riots across the UK - it is time for this to stop. Criminals need to be taught a serious lesson. This needs to be done before it is too late or the next generation will turn out just as bad as this one if not worse.
